title: Bug with Spirit Guard Udyr
body:
So, there's a bug with Udyr's skin, Spirit Guard. He lost his quotes (around 36). There are only Bear Stance quotes only + those not related to any stance (there are only those when you use your maxed stance for the first time). that's really annoying. I hope you can add a bugfix to this patch (I found this bug in patch 4.20, or even earlier, can't remember)

Thanks for reading!

replies.body:
Hey Bubbleq! 

This issue has been around for longer than we would have liked. Unfortunately, Ultiamate skins are a bit more complicated in terms of how they're hooked up, especially SGU since he has several stances. We're currently still working on a fix for this one. Sorry it's not the news you wanted, but I didn't want to leave you in the dark on this one.
